(row = 6, col = 5)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 6, col = 5)

In the current state, my avatar is positioned at (6, 5), and there are several satellite sprites (&) located around that need to be eliminated. However, since my avatar's position has not changed from the last state, I need to take a different action.

I can either rotate or try to move in a direction that will lead to effective engagement with the satellite sprites. Given that there is an "&" sprite to my right (at (6, 6)), I will choose to try moving RIGHT, which should allow me to engage with one of the enemy satellites on my next turn.

``` Action: 3 ``` 

Moving right should bring me closer to engage the satellite sprite effectively while following the strategy of prioritizing enemy elimination.
